title: Intelligence watchdog facing cuts as Liberals seek new powers for national security agencies
description: One of the watchdogs meant to keep Canada's intelligence and security activities in check is warning it will have to reduce the number of reviews it can take on due to the Liberal government’s spending cuts.
content: One of the watchdogs meant to keep Canada's intelligence and security activities in check says its ability to scrutinize those powerful organizations will be hindered due to government spending cuts.… [+3010 chars]
